:: fullwidth-halfwidth;
｡ > '.';
$terminalPunct = [\.\,\:\;\?\!．，：？！｡、；[:Pe:][:Pf:]];
$initialPunct = [:Ps:][:Pi:];
[[:Ideographic:] $terminalPunct] {} [:Letter:] > ' ' ;
[:Letter:] [:Mark:]* {} [[:Ideographic:] $initialPunct] > ' ' ;
< [:Ideographic:] { ' ' } [:Letter:] ;
< [:Letter:] [:Mark:]* { ' ' } [:Ideographic:] ;
